snippet: A world champion speedskater and a volleyball player are suspected of having taken meldonium — the same drug for which Maria Sharapova tested positive.
abstract: Russian speedskater Pavel Kulizhnikov and volleyball player Alexander Markov test positive for recently banned drug meldonium.
lead_paragraph: A world champion speedskater and a volleyball player are suspected of having taken meldonium — the same drug for which Maria Sharapova tested positive.

headline.main: Two Russians Accused of Taking Drug
headline.print_headline: Two Russians Accused of Taking Drug
